verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: continued] [ARG1: his campaign against Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] [ARGM-TMP: during the summit with North Korean leader Kin Jong Un in Singapore] . Trump said that Trudeau 's defiance would " cost a lot of money for the people of Canada . "
